des: "A vegan vinaigrette that goes great with spinach or other greens on a hot summer's day.  Also works well with pasta and grilled vegetable salads."
ins: Combine banana, orange juice, lime juice, jalapeno, oil, vinegar, ginger and salt and pepper in a blender or food processor and puree until smooth.  Transfer to a container with a tight lid, cover, and refrigerate until ready to serve.  Shake before serving.
